summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 51st Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to East 47th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers, in accordance with Majority Petition No. 116051 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
